charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1101_0:
On [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] way to explore the island,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] passed by the
town square.

There, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] saw Roxanne and Marley challenging
the Masked Royal to a battle!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1201_0: Hey, you! Wanna jump in on a battle with me?

I just got challenged, y’see, and I’m looking for
another partner to join me in the ring!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0401_0: Good answer! Let’s do it, then! Ready...fight!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0402_0: Good answer! Let’s do it, then! Ready...fight!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1101_0:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] gave [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="his" F="her" ] all as part
of the team!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1201_1:
Whew... Those were some impressive combinations
you came up with!

You had incredible teamwork. It’s hard to believe
that was your first time battling together. I had a
lot of fun...

Woo! Looks like we snagged the win! But your
team had some really sweet moves that nearly
had us on the ropes!
Thanks for battling us with your full strength!
You two were awesome out there, too!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0401_1:
Yeah! Lots of people watching us started to
cheer us on!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0402_1:
Yeah! Lots of people watching us started to
cheer us on!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1201_1:
The fact that Incineroar was into it means
it was an excellent battle!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0401_2:
My Incineroar gets pumped up whenever the
crowd watching us gets excited!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0402_2:
My Incineroar gets pumped up whenever the
crowd watching us gets excited!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1201_2:
If the audience isn’t feeling it, he loses motivation
and can’t battle at his best.

A good battle excites not only the Trainers
battling it out in the ring but also the spectators
watching them!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0401_2:
Glad you agree! I’ll keep making all my battles as
exciting as that!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0302_2: I wanna fire up the crowd!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0402_2:
Me too! And I’d like to keep having lots of battles
as exciting at that!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1201_3:
Here on Pasio, we can enjoy a new style
of battling.

Team battles are great because you can battle
lots of different Trainers and cooperate with your
teammates at the same time!

I’m gonna take on each and every battle with
everything I’ve got! That’s why I wear this mask!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0401_3:
What are you talking about? I’m the Masked
Royal! Maybe you’re mistaking me for some
professor you know?
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_0402_3:
Who’s this Kukui guy? I’m the Masked Royal!
You must be mistaking me for someone else!
charaepi_ch0117_00_royalmask/2301_1201_3:
Let’s stand in the same ring again soon! Even
if we’re opponents next time, let’s battle to
our fullest!
